definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Medical anthropology is a new intersectional subject.
sentences.chinese: 醫學人類學是一門新興交叉學科。

sentences.english: The tractor shape design is a highly integrated cross-disciplinary.
sentences.chinese: 拖拉機形態設計是一項高度綜合性的交叉學科。

sentences.english: This is a young and intercross subject, full of youthful spirit and expectation .
sentences.chinese: 這是一門年輕的充滿朝氣與希望的交叉學科。
它是一門新興的交叉學科。

sentences.english: The research direction of Haijun Zhou Group is statistical physics and its interdisciplinary applications.
sentences.chinese: 我們的研究方向爲統計物理及其在交叉學科中的應用。

sentences.english: The second part is concerned with the study of cross-disciplinary building in colleges and universities.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，是關於高校交叉學科建設的研究。

sentences.english: Machine vision, a cross-sciences discipline, has a wide application field.
sentences.chinese: 機器視覺是一門交叉學科，有着廣泛的應用領域。

sentences.english: Resource science is an overlapping subject.
sentences.chinese: 資源學是一門尚在發展的交叉學科。

sentences.english: Speech, as a interdiscipline subject has very profound value of research and application.
sentences.chinese: 語音作爲一個交叉學科，具有深遠的研究和應用價值。

sentences.english: ICM, the Interdisciplinary Contest in Modeling, is a part of MCM.
sentences.chinese: 交叉學科建模競賽，是MCM的一個組成部分。

sentences.english: Further cross-disciplinary research note the importance and necessity.
sentences.chinese: 也進一步說明交叉學科研究的重要性和必要性。

sentences.english: This is the website for Bio-X, Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 這是斯坦福大學生物交叉學科研究中心的網站。

sentences.english: A number of areas are involved in the problem of collision, which is also a typical cross-disciplinary subject.
sentences.chinese: 船橋碰撞問題涉及到多個領域，是典型的交叉學科。
